profile.name: Charanteja Yandrapti
profile.aboutMe: I'm Charan Teja, graduated in Bsc.(Computer Science). I develop responsive web pages and systems with an attractive layout. I have a trajectory of about 2 years working with technical support and maintenance of computers, that made me a dedicated and organized professional. Today in the area of ​​live development, continuous learning is focused on JavaScript technologies. I'm looking for opportunities in the market as a dev and, in the near future, I aim to become a Full Stack developer.
